TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Charles_Savarin, title = Charles_Savarin, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Savarin} }

S.FORM: Charles Savarin ryax sa tay 2 nqu tay 10, Charles Savarin, squliq na sezi'. (minhtuw sa kawas tay 1943) mrhuw Dominica ta' misuw hya' ga Charles Savarin, aring ryax tay 2 squ byacing tay 10 sa kawas 2013 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la.
